overview: What time is it? It's Tool Time with group sex and all the grunting you remember! With the kids away at school, Jim and his wife Julian decide to add more power to their sex life by talking busty Tool Time babe Alexis Ford into a 3-way! Sal shows off his handyman skills with a hottie, and even Milson is around to dispense advice from behind his fence. Based on the popular comedy, this parody delivers great jokes and terrific sex with all the power Jim could want!
title: Home Improvement XXX A Parody
